name: Star Picker-Upper
description:
Pick up good stars while avoiding bad ones and try to chain your bounces for combo points!

My first game made with PICO-8.

It turned out pretty good for a first attempt in my opinion. The gameplay itself is a little uninspired, but I had a lot of fun playing with the visuals and learning about the system.

Made for #p8jam2 with PICO-8.
